message.body: I saw a bobcat! Ps. Whats your email address?
Yep, on the 22. It crossed the street and then was stalking something in the grass
I've never seen a bobcat on the drive-usually see great big owls perched on barren branches.

P.p.s.-I hope I didn't say the wrong thing earlier: just to clarify, hydrogen is special in chemistry because it is the only element that can exist without an electron; we refer to a hydrogen cation as a proton in solution, but a neutral hydrogen atom does contain one electron in it's outermost orbital (though it exists diatomically in nature in its gaseous state as 2 H atoms bonded by their respective electrons to form a lone electron pair).
Yay! I love when you talk science to me. Home safe
Glad you made it back in one irresistible wonderful piece.
